Name: ConceptName
Description: A name for the Concept. May be expressed in multiple languages. Repeat the element to express names with different content, for example different names for different systems.

Name: Label
Description: A display label for the Concept. May be expressed in multiple languages. Repeat for labels with different content, for example, labels with differing length limitations.

Name: Description
Description: A description of the content and purpose of the Concept. May be expressed in multiple languages and supports the use of structured content.

Name: SimilarConcept
Description: A reference to a concept expressing a similar idea plus a description of the differences. Used to assist in disambiguation of concepts.

Name: SubclassOfReference
Description: Reference to a Concept that is used for qualifying this data element concept. The referenced Concept should have its isCharacteristic attribute set to true.

Name: IsCharacteristic
Description: If set to "true" this concept is used to describe a characteristic of another concept.
